name: 2024 12th International Conference on Intelligent Computing and Wireless Optical Communications
content: Publication: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees. Accepted papers will be included in ICWOC 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services.
